mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_article_ext where exists(select * from ujcms_article t where t.id_ = ujcms_article_ext.id_ and t.channel_id_ = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
delete from ujcms_article_ext where exists(select * from ujcms_article t where t.id_ = ujcms_article_ext.id_ and t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ujcms_article_ext set title_ = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle_ = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_title_ = #{fullTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_ = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url_ = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_blank_ = #{targetBlank,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, seo_keywords_ = #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_description_ = #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_ = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editor_ = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_ = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offline_date_ = #{offlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sticky_date_ = #{stickyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, image_ = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_ = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_orig_ = #{videoOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_duration_ = #{videoDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audio_ = #{audio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_orig_ = #{audioOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audio_duration_ = #{audioDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_ = #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name_ = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_length_ = #{fileLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, doc_ = #{doc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_orig_ = #{docOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_name_ = #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doc_length_ = #{docLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, article_template_ = #{articleTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, allow_comment_ = #{allowComment,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, static_file_ = #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_static_file_ = #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_ = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_ = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id_ = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reject_reason_ = #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baidu_push_ = #{baiduPush,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, editor_type_ = #{editorType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, image_list_json_ = #{imageListJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, file_list_json_ = #{fileListJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, text_ = #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, markdown_ = #{markdown,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_article_ext (id_, title_, subtitle_, full_title_, alias_, link_url_, target_blank_, seo_keywords_, seo_description_, author_, editor_, source_, offline_date_, sticky_date_, image_, video_, video_orig_, video_duration_, audio_, audio_orig_, audio_duration_, file_, file_name_, file_length_, doc_, doc_orig_, doc_name_, doc_length_, article_template_, allow_comment_, static_file_, mobile_static_file_, created_, modified_, process_instance_id_, reject_reason_, baidu_push_, editor_type_, image_list_json_, file_list_json_, text_, markdown_) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetBlank,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stickyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{audio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audioOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audioDuration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{doc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docOrig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docLength,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowComment,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rejectReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baiduPush,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{editorType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{imageListJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{fileListJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{text,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{markdown,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.title_, t.subtitle_, t.full_title_, t.alias_, t.link_url_, t.target_blank_, t.seo_keywords_, t.seo_description_, t.author_, t.editor_, t.source_, t.offline_date_, t.sticky_date_, t.image_, t.video_, t.video_orig_, t.video_duration_, t.audio_, t.audio_orig_, t.audio_duration_, t.file_, t.file_name_, t.file_length_, t.doc_, t.doc_orig_, t.doc_name_, t.doc_length_, t.article_template_, t.allow_comment_, t.static_file_, t.mobile_static_file_, t.created_, t.modified_, t.process_instance_id_, t.reject_reason_, t.baidu_push_, t.editor_type_, t.image_list_json_, t.file_list_json_, t.text_, t.markdown_
